content: **crocheted head band in drops merino extra fine piece is crocheted with relief stitches and cable ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see teal crossover sweater pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-234 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm width approx 13 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 37 misty forest crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/227-29-teal-crossover-sweater
